parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to extended stopping distances, loss of control, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: the vehicle experiences extended stopping distances
the vehicle vibrates when applying the brakes
the vehicle goes into a spin.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering box mounting can cause complete loss of steering ability, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially at high speeds or on winding roads.
symptoms: steering wheel becomes difficult to turn or feels loose
steering box separates from the frame

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded, especially on highways.
The failure of the power steering hose can cause loss of power steering assist, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, especially at low speeds.
Various issues, such as faulty door motors, regulator/alternator failure, and radiator failure, can cause inconvenience, discomfort, and safety risks to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: heat coming from the rear air conditioner
and oil smell inside the passenger compartment.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire tread separation and failure can cause loss of control, accidents, and rollovers, resulting in injuries and fatalities.
symptoms: tire taking on an oval shape

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fused jump harness can cause electrical system malfunctions, leading to vehicle fires, which can result in property damage and pose a risk to occupants.
symptoms: Smoke coming from under the hood

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission failure can cause unintended acceleration, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Vehicle suddenly accelerates from 0 to 45 mph or faster
vehicle goes into fast gear without warning
engine can be cold or hot when the issue occurs.
